title: Bug 17825 ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is selected
description: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, a Windows 'ding' sound is heard. This behavior seems incorrect.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, a Windows 'ding' sound is heard.
EB: I expect no sound to be heard when selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText.
SR:
1. Open the ControlExampleText.
2. Select the SWT.MULTI option.
3. Observe the Windows 'ding' sound that is heard.
